# EnumHelper.CreateEnumTypeFromStringValue&lt;T&gt; method

Returns a Enum whose enum value matches the indicated value.

```csharp
public static T CreateEnumTypeFromStringValue<T>(string enumValue)
    where T : struct
```

## Return Value

An enum value whose enum value matches the indicated value.
